questions.question: What does the diversity-multiplexing trade-off in MIMO systems represent?

answers.a: Trade-off between bandwidth and transmission distance
answers.b: Trade-off between data rate and probability of error
answers.c: Trade-off between modulation scheme and coding rate
answers.d: Trade-off between transmission power and receiver sensitivity

questions.question: If the maximum achievable diversity gain is 28. However, the diversity gain achieved is 10 and the multiplexing gain is 2. Find the number of transmit and recieve antennas.
